DOC.brief_summary: A maximum 60 subject enrol trial . It non-randomized , open label , single center study . All subject undergo INGN 201 injection IV chemotherapy : doxorubicin docetaxel . This do first 2 day 3-week cycle . After completion 4 6 cycle , subject either proceeds surgery tumor respond therapy , go study tumor response .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Efficacy Safety Docetaxel Doxorubicin With INGN 201 Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Documented late stage breast cancer : stage III AB ( exclude inflammatory breast carcinoma ) localize stage IV breast cancer Male female 18 year old Adequate bone marrow , liver , kidney function
